metadata.name: Inscape #1
metadata.description:
The ultimate energy ‘Prakriti’ creates and recreates herself by herself & from herself eternally.
Shaping life, undoubtedly is an art & our own unfolding & awakening are our salvations and gifts to offer.
The essence of transition is that of faith & surrender & developing a realised spirit.
Putting the whole world in perspective, I value those before us more & staying true to this path & process, constantly earning your stripes, revelation as always is an instant love affair.
These Inscapes embody this connection to the processes of creation.
My journey in the Arts has been a mystic cosmic experience, be it the evolution of my aesthetic or my discoveries dabbling in various mediums, or finding my way to collectors homes and personalities along the way.
Intent & intuition have been graceful guides as always & the series has been a joy to create & now share.


Title: Inscape #1
2160 px * 2880 px .Mp4 with sound.

Art : Sarfaraz Laskari
Sound : Bahaish Kapoor
